responses.rationale: Explicit cue from quoted source ("something I really hadn't seen before") emphasizes unusual severity, preventing purely factual/descriptive presentation.
Explicit emotional cue from quoted source ("very sad thing to see") prevents purely factual/descriptive presentation.
Presentation is purely factual and descriptive, using a technical term ("dead-end infections") without additional framing.
Presentation is purely factual and descriptive, reporting a detection using neutral language and a technical term ("highly pathogenic").
